alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Laurens; Pulaski; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 8:32AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Laurens, northwestern Dodge, Pulaski, Wilcox, southeastern Dooly, Bleckley and Crisp Counties through 900 AM EST... At 832 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near District Path to near Tippettville to Fort Early, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Cochran, Eastman, Hawkinsville, Chester, Rochelle, Arabi, Dexter, Dudley, Pineview, Pitts, Montrose, Union, Dubois, Empire, Mobley Crossing, Mock Springs, Roddy, Baileys Park and Rowland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Laurens; Pulaski; Wilcox
